New Records: Rinku Singh and Prasidh Krishna made their T20I debuts for India against Ireland
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah won the toss and elected to bowl for India
Ireland included pacer Craig Young in their XI
Pre-Game Insights: Jasprit Bumrah returned from an 11-month injury layoff and won the toss
Rinku Singh and Prasidh Krishna aimed to make an impact in their debut
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match marked Rinku Singh's first international appearance and Prasidh Krishna's return to T20I after injury
